name: Golitaire (itch)
description:
This was one relatively quiet 3-days weekend. I never was a fan of playing the solitaire, but thought to myself, maybe coding will be more fun. And it was.

To test the result properly, I added option to save and lode game states. Extended this feature to 10 slots for saving. For now there is only "easy" mode.

The game was made using my favorite game engine, the Godot 3.0.6

The sources are opened under MIT License:
https://gitlab.com/Acvarium/golitaire
